item.title: The Wisdom of the Gospel (1 of 3)
item.description: [![](http://benrwoodard.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/img_0488.jpg)](http://benrwoodard.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/img_0488.jpg)In 1 Corinthians 1 Paul explains that there should be no divisions in the church. According to Paul, the "wisdom of man" believes the gospel message is foolishness and therefore anyone who follows after the cunning words of a man's message just because it "makes sense" more than another is in the wrong. Paul goes on to explain in chapter 2 that true wisdom in the Gospel Mesage (cross and resurrection) can only be understood through the Spirit.
